title: Is there a reason we can't type/see Korean - or any other - language characters in game?
body: They come out as boxes, and one needs to patch to the Korean client - which is annoying because one may only be able to communicate conversationally in Korean, not understand skill explanations and other more intricate things.

replies.body:
Old client/legacy client - search on google for in-game korean chat, you need to change the language setting in notepad.
Alpha client - I have no idea
